reviewText: Wore out my other vhs copy wish it was on Dvd
when my mom was alive I bought this vhs. very good  clear sound was good. Good color . My mom enjoyed this tape so much she pretty much used it every day.

It was great fun to watch the stars of the old show perform some of their material current day with the same vigor they had low those many years ago.  What talent they exhibit!  I particularly LOVE the Lennon Sisters, a lovely group of entertaining and talented women then and now!  BUY THIS DVD and enjoy a bit of Lawrence Welk as his show might be today!

I would have rather seen more "then" than "now" but it was the other way around. With all the Lawrence Welk Show years on TV, there was no shortage of available material, they just didn't use much of it.
